_source.text: Additionally, because everyone is busy not paying attention to you, you are free to spam shadow bolts with your 5% multiplier on soul link, and your 5% multiplier on Felguard, which ends up being better than shadow mastery.

text: bolts with your 5% multiplier on soul **link**, and your 5% multiplier on Felguard, which **ends** up being **better** **than** **shadow** mastery.
